ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Magnetic field measured at 0.5sec intervals with the induction magnetometer at Tjornes, Iceland.
ResourceHeader.Description: Magnetic field measured at 0.5sec intervals with the induction magnetometer at Tjornes, Iceland. The data is stored together with the magnetic field from the fluxgate magnetometer and CNA from the broad-beam riometer.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please contact the Principal Investigator, Dr. Akira Kadokura (kadokura [at] nipr.ac.jp), National Institute of Polar Research (NIPR) before using the data at any publications and/or presentations. We welcome collaborative research and strongly recommend users to contact us early in order to ensure that the data are suitable for their research. When the data are used at any publications and/or presentations, we would like to ask the users to acknowledge NIPR and send us one copy of the reprints. An example of the acknowledgement statement is as follows: "Magnetic field data were provided by National Institute of Polar Research, Japan."

AccessURL.Name: Conjugate Observation between Syowa Station and Iceland

NumericalData.Keyword: EARTH SCIENCE Sun-earch Interaction Ionosphere/Magnetosphere Dynamics Magnetic Fields/Magnetic Currents

Parameter.Name: Vector magnetic field
Parameter.Description: Two horizontal components measured with the induction magnetometer. dH/dt: northward component, dD/dt: eastward component.
